amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the sugar sections in the commodity title as well as the feedstock flexibility program for bioenergy producers, extending current programs until 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 110-261 to strike the sugar sections in the commodity title as well as the feedstock flexibility program for bioenergy producers, extending current programs until 2012.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 282 (Roll no. 751).
